products.title: Dragonfly Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This mineral blue dragonfly curtain, in a soft blue colour, makes this muted curtain a must for insect-lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Dragonfly Aqua Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This aqua blue dragonfly curtain blind, on a soft white background, makes this muted curtain a must for nature lovers. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly aqua curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Teal Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a bold jewel-tone teal blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee teal curtain is suitable.

products.title: Bumblebee Mineral Blue Curtain
products.description: Their bumblebee range mixes patterns inspired by a traditional favourite of english gardeners, and contemporary shades. Classic traditional design, on a soft sky blue background makes this bumblebee curtain a must for nature-lovers and keen gardeners alike. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to enliven, you can be confident that this bumblebee mineral blue curtain is suitable.

products.title: Paradise, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: The naturally toned paradise in saxon blue offers gorgeous shades of green and blue on a soft white background. And, made from 100% cotton, its smooth fabric sits neatly in attractive roman folds, looking right at home wherever it's hung. Use the saxon blue to breathe colour into the living room, surrounding it with matching cool blues, as well as the occasional green to accent. Add plenty of fresh cotton and linen fabrics in the form of throws and cushions for extra cosiness.

products.title: Hollihocks, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The gorgeous shades of navy, teal, and pink in the stunningly country-style hollihocks navy stand out beautifully against the pale background and olive green accents. With it's linen-feel woven fabric, this roman blind is the perfect addition to a more rural setting. Pair the navy with country cream or palest blue walls in the kitchen or dining room for a fresh garden style. Use the vibrant colours of the fabric to choose accenting accessories in various shades, from placemats to utensils.

products.title: Aretha, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The aretha in navy offers colour galore, blending beautiful shades of rich indigo, deep teal, bright coral, and warm fuchsia with muted tones of green, grey, and beige. The end result is bold and striking, with unforgettable colour. Use the navy as the star of the show in your living room or dining room. Surround with equally rich colours, tempering with soft creams and neutrals as needed. You'll end up with a warm and cosy room full of rich colour and character.

products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash turquoise blue perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this saturated blue perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Brittany Blue Perfect Fit Roller Blind

products.title: Woodland, Saxon Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: You'll love the gorgeously abstract blue tones of the misty woodland in saxon blue. The occasional sage green and pale dove grey is there to accent, and the imagery sits on a clean white background for contrast. Add the saxon blue to a downstairs cloakroom or utility to give the room a cool hue by painting the room a soft white and accessorising with blues and greens. To go along with the woodland theme, add some foliage or wildflower wall art to boot.

products.title: Kensington, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: The grey-toned navy blue that forms the background for the bold and vivacious kensington navy is rich and appealing, whilst the colours it boasts, in indigo, ocean, and petrol blues, plus varying shades of green, truly pop from the fabric. Hang the navy as part of a grand yet contemporary dining room, where darker woods rule and drama takes pride of place. Accent the room with matching aqua blues and hot fuchsia, using them to bring out the rich tones of the blind.

products.title: Camden, Blue - Roman Blind
products.description: An abstract depiction of blue, aqua, and teal blossoms, the camden in blue offers a striking array of hues, with a cool and arty aesthetic. It's part-linen make-up means the fabric is light yet hardwearing, giving you a blind that will stand the test of time. Hang the blue in a contemporary living room, where wooden floorboards take centre stage and white walls show off bursts of blue and green colour in the form of wall art.

products.title: Rubber Duck (Blackout), Navy - Roller Blind
products.description: Our new rubber duck blackout navy fabric is the finishing touch your new bathroom has been waiting for. With a playful design that's guaranteed to make you smile, combined in perfect harmony with a healthy dose of contemporary chic style, it has everything you could ever want from your new roller blinds. Match rubber duck with a range of light blue painted walls, and a whole host of trinkets on the walls.

products.title: Splash Turquoise Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Splash turquoise blue panel blinds are a fabulous way to dress your window. The mid blue, moisture-resistant fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Tiffany Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash tiffany blue panel blinds are a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This bright blue dim-out fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Sapphire Blue Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash sapphire blue panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush dark blue panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its cool, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Navy - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Metis Solar Light Blue Neat Fit Pleated Blind
products.description: Metis solar pleated fabric is available in a wide range of colours and features a silver solar speckled backing. Fantastic for conservatories, hot rooms like offices or even rooms with south-facing windows. A strong blue tone, metis light blue bring feelings of the ocean to your home. Pair with soft breezy scents and light furnishings to create a relaxation room. products.title: Kent, Navy - Roman Blind
products.description: With its military connotations, the colour navy is a force to be reckoned with. The classic kent fabric, with its plush, chenille texture, adds a softness and sense of cosiness to the colour, resulting in a stylish and appealing blind. Settle the navy against white or cream walls in the living room or master bedroom, matching it to other, differently textured fabrics throughout the room. Accent with a rich, saffron yellow to make the navy truly pop, and you have yourself an attractive, on-trend colour scheme.
